Question: "Jake" Clare, this person sang in a trio of boy sopranos at, among other occasions, Westminster Abbey for Queen Elizabeth II.
Hints: This person has said: "I've always thought songs written by two people are better than those written by one.
This person recalls: "We were writing these terrible pop songs that were becoming Top 10 hits..
Ian Stewart says this person is the Rolling Stones band leader, while this person says his job is to be "oiling the machinery".
